features: The Rover Pack Mini Canvas is made from water-resistant 12oz canvas with a cinch top closure
An exterior front pocket and top flap pocket give quick access to smaller items and internal laptop sleeve keeps your tablet secure
Expandable side pockets can easily hold snacks or extra gear
Cotton canvas with water repellent finish
Flap top with dual side-release buckle closures
Drawstring cinch closure access to main compartment
Oversized YKK zippers with paracord zipper pulls
Materials: 12oz cotton canvas with water repellent finish, 210D nylon pack cloth
